mapper.select: select name from ( select b.name from man_system_userrole a,man_system_role b where a.roleid=b.billid and a.userid= #{userId} union all select concat('(ç»„:' ,d.name,')',c.name) as name from man_system_usergroup a, man_system_rolegroup b,man_system_role c,man_system_group d where a.groupid=b.groupid and b.roleid=c.billid and b.groupid=d.billid and a.userid=#{userId} ) as allname order by name desc
select * from sys_user u join terminal_user tu on u.id = tu.id where u.username = #{username} and tu.status != 9 limit 1
select u.* from sys_user u join terminal_user tu on u.id = tu.id where id = #{id} and tu.status != 9
select * from sys_user u join terminal_user tu on u.id = tu.id where u.alias = #{alias} and tu.status != 9 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, type, username, alias, password, group_id, create_time, modified_time) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{username}, #{alias}, #{password}, #{group_id}, #{create_time}, #{modified_time})
